item.title: The takeover has begun
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

ytuio9`:

If you didn’t know, you can create an end portal in a creative world, you just need to spawn the portal blocks yourself.

If you didn’t know, we already discussed this but you probably didn’t read it.

Read full topic

item.title: The takeover has begun
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“triston001, post:22, topic:437133”][quote author=omgilikepie link=topic=539848.msg3952871#msg3952871 date=1332454533]
@Triston What is the point in that, it was just a simple question lol…
[/quote]

And as for triston. how often do you see me on? why would I take the time to downgrade my minecraft.jar, log on to the server, walk my happy ass to the portal, and go to the end, when i can ask a simple question and expect not to get flamed? I cant help the fact that badger gets offended by a simple question.

OKAY, is it The End, or creative. just simply answer this simply question truthfully. also, because you had kept argueing back about whether or not it could be mods and text packs, the only way for u to get undeniable proof is just to visit the End, which is why i stated that. i always keep a copy of all the version jars in a file i have so i can quickly swap versions it could be a good idea for anyone to follow unless they have a better method.[/quote]
your an idiot. sorry if i offend you but. all portals are disabled in creative mode. except for the portal back to W1.

Read full topic

item.title: The takeover has begun
item.dc:creator: @triston001 triston001
item.description:
@triston001 wrote:

omgilikepie:

@Triston What is the point in that, it was just a simple question lol…

And as for triston. how often do you see me on? why would I take the time to downgrade my minecraft.jar, log on to the server, walk my happy ass to the portal, and go to the end, when i can ask a simple question and expect not to get flamed? I cant help the fact that badger gets offended by a simple question.

OKAY, is it The End, or creative. just simply answer this simply question truthfully. also, because you had kept argueing back about whether or not it could be mods and text packs, the only way for u to get undeniable proof is just to visit the End, which is why i stated that. i always keep a copy of all the version jars in a file i have so i can quickly swap versions it could be a good idea for anyone to follow unless they have a better method.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

hat trix:

you didnt state in a sarcastic manor that it wasn’t creative, so i did. then, you started being an asshole about it. sarcasm makes you look like an asshole, and i was just backing my statement up that it very well could have been a texture pack. and still, you have yet to prove to me what i have done on the server that makes me a “troll”…

yes i did do you not understand sarcasm or something? Like i said if you wanna continue this stupid argument, PM me, otherwise im just gonna report any arguing reply as spam from here on.

Read full topic

item.title: The takeover has begun
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“omgilikepie, post:12, topic:437133”]I love how he’s getting flamed over a simple question…It was late at night when he posted that and was probably tired…Have ya’ll never gotten tired to where you could barely make out what something is? Also, there are mods that allow you to disable things such as the moon/stars.

@Triston What is the point in that, it was just a simple question lol…

smh[/quote]

??? since when is a sarcastic answer flame?

smh

hat trix:

Because badger jumped down my throat for no reason, then started making false accusations. Shit would piss you off a bit too, im sure.

no i didnt wtf are you on about, i simply stated a sarcastic answer, and you chose to get offended and start a heated discussion.

@false accusations, dont even go there when youre coming up with retarded situations such as ‘shitty texture packs’ ‘mods that remove stars’ etc to back up whatever argument you have against me when i merely stated, in a sarcastic manner, that i was in the end, and not creative.

If you want to continue this stupid argument, PM me, im tired of this derail in what should be a humorous topic.

Read full topic

item.title: The takeover has begun
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:15, topic:437133”][quote author=mironic link=topic=539848.msg3952961#msg3952961 date=1332463486]

It was 2 in the morning, It is very well possible for a stronghold to be inside a 1kX1k world. I have found one located around -250,500 on one of my servers. Sand is yellow, that stone is yellow. who is to say the picture wasn’t taken using a texture pack. besides, I have been in “the end” one time, I don’t know what the blocks look like.

Are you fucking retarded or do you just like to act that way?

i dont care if it was 2am, there would still be noticable stars,

its a texture pack when every other texture is vanilla, oh my jesus…

this is moparcraft, there is no stronghold available in its creative world

oh and if i remember right, you act like a total troll everytime you login to the server

[u]Funny, you must be mistaking. I never troll anyone

Lies.
[/quote]

The only person i come close to trolling was tom, and that still wasn’t anything close to me “trolling” anyone. i don’t find fun in trolling simply because i fucking hate being trolled. i actually fall for trolls more easily then most, lol.[/quote]
lol y so serious?

Read full topic

item.title: The takeover has begun
item.dc:creator: @hat_trix hat trix
item.description:
@hat_trix wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:10, topic:437133”][quote author=hat trix link=topic=539848.msg3952777#msg3952777 date=1332445772]
It was 2 in the morning, It is very well possible for a stronghold to be inside a 1kX1k world. I have found one located around -250,500 on one of my servers. Sand is yellow, that stone is yellow. who is to say the picture wasn’t taken using a texture pack. besides, I have been in “the end” one time, I don’t know what the blocks look like.

Are you fucking retarded or do you just like to act that way?
[/quote]

i dont care if it was 2am, there would still be noticable stars,

its a texture pack when every other texture is vanilla, oh my jesus…

this is moparcraft, there is no stronghold available in its creative world

oh and if i remember right, you act like a total troll everytime you login to the server[/quote]

Funny, you must be mistaking. I never troll anyone, and I’m quite a friendly person (unless you give me reason not to be). From what I remember, I have been on maybe once or twice while you were on, and 1 of those times I offered you land in the city that me and manbearpig owned. I have been in creative world maybe once, and I have played maybe 5 times for about 10 minutes each time since creative has been around because I gave up all my items and basically quit (besides to help mbp make a spleef arena). You honestly have no clue what you are talking about, mate.

There are no more then 2 stars (or snowballs, cant tell) in each picture, so that’s completely out of the equation.

Some texture packs (especially the low detail ones) don’t change npc textures, so the only other block I would have to base off of would be snow (because the obsidian blended in the background). So that’s 2 blocks telling me that you aren’t using a shitty texture pack. In any case, Its not like i remember exactly pixel by pixel of what the snow texture looks like, so that only leaves me with 1 block. One im not familuar with (being that I have only been to the end once). so I’m supposed to assume its in “the end” when i have every reason to assume it was anywhere else BUT the end?

Lets rage now guys.

And as for triston. how often do you see me on? why would I take the time to downgrade my minecraft.jar, log on to the server, walk my happy ass to the portal, and go to the end, when i can ask a simple question and expect not to get flamed? I cant help the fact that badger gets offended by a simple question.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“hat trix, post:7, topic:437133”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=539848.msg3952494#msg3952494 date=1332411543]

is this in creative mode? i hope…

explain how an end portal could be created in creative
[/quote]

well, considering the picture is dark, the obsidian blends with the sky, it was late last night, and the blocks on the ground looked like sand. It looks like normal world and night time.

end portal CAN be created in creative mode, by the way.
for each world created, a nether and end world is created (unless disabled). all you need to do is spawn some ender eyes and search for the stronghold (as long as the stronghold is inside the boundaries).

explained.[/quote]

yea ok lets find a stronghold in a 1000x1000 world,

yea night time, wheres the stars

sand doesnt look anything like that
